title: Weir Farm National Historic Site: Social Media
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Social Media              Social Media          Facebook 'Like' Weir Farm National Historic Site on Facebook to stay up to date with upcoming programs and special events, as well as updates about collections, artwork, and happenings at the park.         Instagram Connect with the park and see some inspiring images and videos. #americasbestidea            YouTube Visit the official Weir Farm National Historic Site YouTube page and see videos created by Park Rangers highlighting: activities to do at the park, using the Take Part in Art supplies, & painting tips from local artists (coming soon!)
